page.title: 18WESTERN MINIATURE RIFLE CLUB
page.content:
A few hundred yards from St Ouen's Parish Church is the clubhouse of the Western Miniature Rifle Club.
To become a member you pay Â£16.00 a year and this lets you shoot on a Tuesday evening throughout the winter from 19.15 to 22.30hrs.
If you become good enough you can enter competitions with other clubs. Most competition nights are on a Friday.
The club has between 50 and 60 members.
The members are of all ages and from all backgrounds.
Safety-first is the rule which is very important in this club.
